data.text: @Cocoballzilla You're welcome, Cocoballz. If you’ve got other inquiries, just message us here. :)

@ronaldcarl Hi, Ronald. As much as we'd like to provide you with an update, we can only hope for your kind understanding as we are also dependent on the updates of our partner departments. We'll get back to you as soon as we have news. Thank you.
@Pookikabooki Hello, Possibility. We are sorry to hear this. May we know if you have tried calling (+632) 84017779 / (+632) 8401-7697? Thank you.
@koolitz You're welcome.
@h2h0e4u Hi, Pikeychu. If you're arriving in the Philippines, you may check this link for your guide: https://t.co/OyswK7dIfl
@h2h0e4u (2/2) Please note that the travel requirements are constantly changing and evolving. Kindly also check with the local/international unit for the latest travel update. Thank you.

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

data.text:
@h2h0e4u (1/2) Hi, Pikeychu. Travel requirements vary per destination. You can check the travel rules, requirements, and travel guide at this link:

https://t.co/wg2BxmMgDQ

data.text: @Nelia78378224 Hello, Nelia. We have requested for a follow-up from the relevant office. The soonest we receive their advice, we will let you know. Thank you.

urls.title: Fill | myPAL Request Hub
urls.description: Booking requests at your fingertips. The myPAL Request Hub provides passengers with convenient servicing options. Through this secure online form, you can request the following transactions wherever you are: • Rebook due to schedule change, travel restrictions, or cancellations • Convert your Ticket to a Travel Credit • Request for refund • Follow-up on an existing request You can use this online facility in 3 easy steps: 1. Fill out the form 2. Click SUBMIT 3. Receive a confirmation via email Important Reminders: • For more information on your booking change options, visit https://bit.ly/PALPassengerOptions page. • For tickets issued by our partner travel agents, requests on booking changes must be made through your issuing travel agent. • myPAL Request Hub can assist requests for changes to confirmed bookings on Philippine Airlines flights which were made through the PAL Website, PAL Mobile App, PAL Ticket Offices, or PAL’s Reservations Hotline.

data.text:
@PaulDrake0226 @titaAbel @Manuherrera_28 Hello, we’re sorry if you experience some issues with our website. Here is a quick troubleshooting guide we advise you to try.
(1) Clear your browsing history, cache, and cookies
(2) Use a different browser or device

Let us know if this works or if you need more help. Thank you.
@aboomaralsalhi May we know the office or email address you are in coordination with regarding your upgrade concern? Thank you.

@loving_f Please note that fare rates (including promo fares) may change from time to time, depending on several factors such as travel date, travel destination, service class and seat availability. Thank you! ✈

(2/2)

@starlightsanya Hello, yena. We regret to learn of your baggage concern. May we know the office or email address you have coordinated with? Thank you.
@titaAbel @Manuherrera_28 May we confirm if have tried typing in the flight number on the Flight Status tab of our website homepage, tita? Thank you.

@titaAbel @Manuherrera_28 Please click on the ‘Flight Status’ tab on the homepage, and provide either your flight number or your travel details on the corresponding date field. Thank you!

(2/2)

data.text:
@titaAbel @Manuherrera_28 Hi, tita Abel. You may check our website, https://t.co/ePCV23PQfZ, for flight status updates starting two (2) days before your flight departure date.

(1/2)
@arielmg47 Hello, Ariel. We regret to learn of your baggage concern. May we confirm if this was reported upon her arrival? Thank you.
@JoeQMultimedia Hello, Joe. We regret to learn of your reported experience. May we confirm if you are the affected passenger that provided the feedback from the screenshot? Thank you.
@EmohHemo Hello, Hemo. We have sent you a DM to assist you on your inquiry. Thank you.
@_strawberrykate Hello, Kate. We regret to learn of your reported experience. Please approach our airport personnel for assistance. Thank you.

@aboomaralsalhi Hi! May we know where you've requested for the upgrade?

@stanchunghafrvr We've responded to your DM, Jiwon.
@RomarcoXomE17 Hi, Emox. We're so sorry for this. Should you need immediate assistance, you may approach our Airport Staff / Cabin Crew. Thank you.
@mcFury613 As previously mentioned, we can assist you here once your booking is confirmed.
@4EreZ4yws2E2kPm We have sent you a DM. Thank you!
@4EreZ4yws2E2kPm Hi, Aurora. We're trying to send you a DM, but we're unable to. Please make sure the feature is enabled on your profile. Thank you!

urls.description: Sorry, the page or link you selected is no longer

data.text:
@mcFury613 You have the option to process your booking entirely either through our hotline or ticketing offices instead if you wish to purchase seats and baggage alongside your booking. 

Contact us: https://t.co/M2gSLHlo95
@mcFury613 Yes, we suggest to proceed with the booking first. We can assist you in purchasing additional baggage and seat after your booking is confirmed :)
@koolitz We'll confirm this with the concerned station, Donj. May we confirm if your flight is MNL-BCD?
@mcFury613 May we know if you've tried purchasing additional baggage or seat upon booking?
@mcFury613 Hi, Krista. We're sorry to hear this. May we know the "special request" included in your reservation?

@koolitz Fully-vaccinated passengers are no longer required to present a negative COVID-19 test, Donj.

A negative Rapid Antigen Test Result is required for unvaccinated or partially vaccinated individuals taken from any DOH-accredited laboratories valid within 48 hours prior departure.

data.text:
@mcFury613 Hi, Krista. We are sorry to hear about this. May we advise you first to conduct basic troubleshooting and try again.

- clear browsing history, cache, and cookies
- use a different browser or device
- use a different card or payment method

Thank you.
@koolitz (2/2) Please note that the travel requirements are constantly changing and evolving. Kindly also check with the local/international unit for the latest travel update. Thank you.

@koolitz (1/2) Hi, Donj. For more detailed information on the latest Travel Requirements to Bacolod. Please refer to the provided link below. 

https://t.co/wkw0TkwwtO

@Manny_Kr01 Our apologies for this, Em. May we know if you have tried using a different mode of payment? Fare rates (including promo fares) depend on several factors including your preferred travel dates, service class, and seat availability. That's why they may change from time to time.
@itsallendom We have sent you a DM. Thank you.
@Manny_Kr01 Our system is currently having issues with your used mode of payment. May we suggest to try using another mode of payment instead?

@Alzamli1 However, please note that entry restrictions and requirements are constantly evolving. Thus, we highly suggest to check this with the concerned travel authority in your origin and destination as well. 

(2/2)
@dizaoinkyy You're welcome!
@dizaoinkyy Hi, Vanessa. If you are booked directly with us, you may send an email to web_ereceipt@pal.com.ph to request for a copy of your official receipt. Thank you.
@jparkslauron Hi, James. We have sent you a DM. Kindly check. We recommend to delete this tweet containing your booking information as this may compromise your data privacy. Thank you.

data.text: @nicogonzales This is noted, Nicholas. We apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for your patience.
@justindunne Hi, Justin. As requested, we have sent you a DM. Thank you.
@1991_zac Hi Aamir. We apologize for the delay. May we know which office did you send your concern to?
@PamelaCoton We sent you a DM, Pamela.
@nicogonzales Hi, Nicholas. We're sorry for the inconvenience. May we know if you were able to approach any of our airport staff / cabin crew for assistance?
@K00K11K Hi! We've responded to your DM :)
@marumarupuua We've been informed that our Instagram Team also responded to your message. You may kindly continue correspondence there instead. Thank you so much!
@marumarupuua Hi! We're sorry for the inconvenience. Allow us to assist you on this. We've sent you a DM for your details, so we could proceed.
@rycel_velasco Our apologies but we cannot guarantee a timeframe, RycelV. May we clarify if you are unable to choose PayPal as your mode of payment?
@avialiefa Our apologies but we have limited access to third party bookings, Avi. :( Your issuing agent is in the best position to assist you on your concern.
@rycel_velasco This is noted. We're currently experiencing issues with cards issued in the US and Canada. May we request for the error prompt when using PayPal?
@rycel_velasco Noted, RycelV. May we know if you have tried using a different mode of payment?
@avialiefa Hi, Avi. We're sorry to hear this. May we clarify if you have already tried coordinating with your issuing agent for further assistance on this booking?
